comment: My Instagram doesn't work.. It's very nice and save alot of space in my phone. But I don't need the other app.the very important to me is my email.. My facebook messenger, whatsapp and viber.. But very useful

reply.author: NewSoftwares.net
reply.content:
We really appreciate your feedback, we will look upon these app and will try to implement it in future version.
Thanks, 
Social Media Vault Team.

author: Heather Youngblood
comment: I actually thought to myself; What a great Idea. I can install this..and save space as well as have every-thing in one convenient place! Well Unfortunetly I can't get in.. and I have no one to talk to to find out why my password is not working! Or how to to get into access my stuff. What a oain your app has created...

reply.author: NewSoftwares.net
reply.content:
Please open main login screen of your Social Media Vault, tap Forgot Password an immediate email will be sent to your provided email ID containing your password.
In case still your problem exists, then contact us support@newsoftwares.net so that we can guide you accordingly.
Thanks,
Social Media Vault Team.

author: Red Coleman
comment: I like that it saves me storage space with downloading apps. My only question: Why didn't somebody think of this sooner?
Its really good only thing i didnt like was there was no messenger and i had to download a seperate app for messemger

author: Stephen Snell
comment: Superb 100%,just what I was looking for (apps all in one place,no more clogging up my phone's internal memory)
Liking it so far. It's ad free like I was looking for. Thank you.

author: Kourii Khaos
comment: Convenient af

author: Arthur Mann
comment: Great

author: Rosanna Wells
comment: For what I use media for, this app is great. Doesn't appear to use my battery like the official FB app does. I can view media easily (which cropping has been an issue with other programs I've tried). The only problem is the adds. Thankfully they only open full screen when I'm opening the media to start with, but they play sound even when my phone is on silent. I'd actually pay for this app if it had that as an option for no adds. But apart from that it's a great app. I'm very happy I found it.

author: Mary Thomas
comment: Really wish there was Snapchat and meetup. I use those more than anything. Twitter and Pinterest don't seem to want to open and Pinterest won't let me sign in to my account... Otherwise very clean design I like it. Will update my review one way or the other once I'm more used to using this app.

author: Lisa Juliff
comment: I cannot give a review on how the app works because every time I try to load it it tells me 'Unfortunately Social Media Vault has stopped' I tried uninstalling and reinstalling but the issue continued. Guess I'll find a different app to try.
title: Crashes

author: Amr Mohy
comment: It's the best app in the category.. It needs some updates and changes..as the Facebook messages is not working and there is no way to control the notification..but it's better than most of the apps I tried so far.

Please make this more Faster and quicker. As of now this app seems like a BROWSER with multiple well arranged tabs.. Also make this appear like an app, because now this seems and feels like a Browser.. I can very well use a browser with multiple tabs instead of this app. Please make this faster and also make it feel like an app. Thanks.

comment: For the most part the app works pretty well and there is small time in loading, but with all the bs you get I guess it's worth it.
